data.text: @DeptVetAffairs Please explain to me how much the VA cares when I send a secure message saying that I need help and I get ignored multiple times. If the VA cares they would show it. How many other vets are ignored? How many vets are no longer here because of this kind of treatment?
@DeptVetAffairs Good luck even getting a consult to specialized care within the VHA or in the community!
@DeptVetAffairs Fuck off. Vets are better off killing ourselves than ever reaching out to the va

@DeptVetAffairs How can veterans do that when you are torturing them and re-opening wounds all over again with these stupid caregiverâ€™s reassessments and unjust discharges? Did you really think that these abusive reassessments would not trigger a veteran?

@DeptVetAffairs @DeptVAAffairs Propaganda tweets are exploitative & for favorable public opinion. It has absolutely NOTHING to do w/US Military Vets & everything to do w/how disconnected VA is w/the entire pop. of American Veterans. VA mental health system is corrupt/dysfunctional/dangerous! @AP

@DeptVetAffairs @DeptVetAffairs causes mass trauma, physical/psychological damage to US Service-Connected Disabled, Women, & LGBTQ+ Veterans from every background across the entire nation! Veterans Affairs, DOD, all military branches, Commander in Chief & Dems are responsible for the damage! @AP
